text: The 1953 Giro di Lombardia cycling race took place on October 25, 1953, and was won by Fiorelli's Bruno Landi. It was the 47th edition of the Giro di Lombardia "monument" classic race. ==General classification == {| class="wikitable" |- style="background:#ccccff;" ! !Cyclist !Team !Time |- |1 | |Fiorelli |align=right| 6h 01' 50" |- |2 | |Peugeot-Dunlop |align=right| m. t. |- |3 | |Fiorelli |align=right| m. t. |- |4 | |Peugeot-Dunlop |align=right| m. t. |- |5 | |Frejus |align=right| m. t. |- |6 | |Garin-Wolber |align=right| m. t. |- |7 | |Ganna-Ursus |align=right| m. t. |- |8 | |Benotto-Levrieri |align=right| m. t. |- |9 | |Arbos |align=right| m. t. |- |10 | |Bianchi- Pirelli |align=right| m. t. |- |} ==References== El Sitio de Ciclismo 1953 Category:1953 in road cycling Category:1953 in Italian sport Category:1953 Challenge Desgrange-Colombo
title: 1953 Giro di Lombardia
